20110127180643.000|20110127180644.000|CC1|HARPS HAS COVERED IT UP ON      
20110127180644.000|20110127180645.000|CC1|MAGAZINE RACKS.                 
20110127180645.000|20110127180646.000|CC1|>> WHY?
